projects.description: Analyzing YouTube comments, number of likes, dislikes and total number of views and concluding whether is video is watchable or not.
Single platform for praticing both coding questions and aptitude questions so that student don't have to search for different sources for preparation.

projects.projectName: Augmented Reality based App for Education
projects.description: AR based application designed for Marathi Alphabets for pre-primary sudents in rural India to make teaching-learning process more interactive and fun.
